Nuru Browser
component.summary: A modern, optimized Electron-based web browser
A modern, optimized Electron-based web browser with a minimalistic interface, inspired by the Arc browser design

description.p: Nuru Browser is a modern, optimized Electron-based web browser with a minimalistic interface, inspired by the Arc browser design. It features hardware acceleration, tabs management, animated controls, and a focus on performance and aesthetics.

ul.li: Modern UI with Arc-inspired frameless window design
Dark mode with automatic system theme detection
Built-in ad blocker and sponsor skipper
Password manager with secure local storage

description.p: Initial release of Nuru Browser with core features including modern UI, dark mode, ad blocking, and password management.
